meanings.definition: relating to or resembling a bat

meanings.sent2: The cave was home to many vespertilian inhabitants.
meanings.sent3: The vespertilian costume at the party was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: Her vespertilian wings shimmered in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The vespertilian silhouette against the full moon was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The vespertilian breeze brought relief after a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The vespertilian colors of the sunset painted the sky beautifully.
